title: ME Systems Laboratory
description: Measurement and analysis of mechanical, acoustic, manufacturing, thermodynamic, fluid, and heat transfer phenomena.  Emphasis on data acquisition, reduction, analysis, and report preparation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ME 3017 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3015 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 3515 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and ME 3057 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ME 3345 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
